page.title: 15Recreational Facilities
page.content: There are no children's playgrounds or other such recreational facilities in either of the villages of Beswick or Watton. The nearest such playground, incorporating swings, slide, climbing frames and roundabout, is about two miles away at Hutton Cranswick. Further playgrounds can be found in both Beverley and Driffield. Beswick Amateur Football Club presently run two teams in the local Driffield League. Their home pitch is situated in a field belonging to Mr. D.J. Duggleby of Beswick - map ref. (05012,04478), changing facilities being available just across the village road. Of the 30 or so registered players only two live locally, although several others have immediate or more distant family living in or near the village.
